General.Name: Pinago Utama Tbk Pt
General.Description: PT PINAGO UTAMA Tbk engages in the oil palm and rubber plantation business in Indonesia. It is also involved in organic fertilizer related business. The company was founded in 1979 and is based in Jakarta Utara, Indonesia.
General.Address: Rukan Exclusive Bukit Golf Mediterania, Jakarta Utara, Indonesia, 14470
